data.name: 'Río Balis' used
data.desc: Earliest use of Río Balis for Haulover Creek by Bacalar vecinos carrying mail to [Santiago de?] Guat for Gov of Yuc
data.agents_sp: Manuel Rodríguez, Sebastían Rodríguez [missg] vecinos of Bacalar
data.prim_n: MEXICO,360 [a 7 feb 1643 inc Auto y relación a 13 dec 1642]
data.note: Not realising this was a branch of Belize River /v Bulmer 147, citing use of Balis by Friar José Delgado in relación of entrada of 1677
